ComicInfo.Penciller: Howard Purcell,Leonard Starr,Ruben Moreira,Ruben Moreira,Howard Purcell,Leonard Starr
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Nine Lives of Alger Denham!: A newspaper reporter first falls for the story he is told by Alger Denham, a man seemingly possessed by ingenious abilities. Then he uncovers a plot to murder his uncle behind it.
Lover from the Dead!: French actess Clairon breaks the heart of a man and is haunted by his voice for two years.
Strange Beliefs!: Account of New Year's Day customs.
The Devil Mask of Death!: A group of tourists in Rio de Janeiro dons native devil masks for a parade. One of them, Peter Brent, wants to harm a friend of his, but is hit by a curse before he can accomplish his evil plan.
Museum of Murder!: The killer "angel face" Finny hides as dummy in a wax museum.
Mysterious Portrait: The painter Rossetti unknowingly recreates a painting which had been done 400 years before him.
The Riddle of the Split Siamese Twins!: Peppi and Paul Belinda are Siamese twins working as a high wire act in the circus. When they are surgically separated, they keep sharing mind control and start a criminal career as robbers.
ComicInfo.Title: The Nine Lives of Alger Denham!; Lover from the Dead!; Strange Beliefs!; The Devil Mask of Death!; Museum of Murder!; Mysterious Portrait; The Riddle of the Split Siamese Twins!
